DescriptionData.Title: Snazaroo Book Kit - Ghouls, Gore and More (8 colors)
DescriptionData.Description:
Snazaroo Book Kit - "Ghouls, Gore and More" includes the Face Painting Book "Ghoul's, Gore and More" and eight Snazaroo 2 ml face paints (White, Black, Bright Red, Sky Blue, Bright Green, Burgundy, Light Brown and Dark Grey). The face painting book has easy-to-follow steps for really quick scary but fun designs featuring guest artist Sean Avram from Vermont. This pack is a great resource for beginner or intermediate face painters to learn more about face paint designs.
Snazaroo Face Paints are hypoallergenic and the world's safest face paints, meeting US FDA, Canadian, and European standards for cosmetic safety and the only face paint with a Child Toy Safety Rating. Snazaroo paint is non-toxic and easy to use face paint that is water-based, fragrance-free and wash off easily.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 8 color Snazaroo Cat Face Painting Kit will paint well over 50 faces
Non toxic, hypo allergenic and child friendly paint from Snazaroo
White, Black, Bright Red, Sky Blue, Bright Green, Burgundy, Light Brown, Dark Grey
